message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $90. How about we try $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about we try $95? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm trying to stick to my budget.
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $102?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. How about we try $98? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $105 again?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so how about we try $100? I'm really interested in the product, and I think this is a fair price.
